file.name: insert.fragment.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
paths:
  '/items':
    post:
      summary: add a new feature
      description: create a new feature
      operationId: postFeature
      tags:
        - Insert Extension
      security:
        - BearerAuth: [application]
      parameters:
        - in: header
          name: Authorization
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: A bearer JWT with an 'application' role
          default: Bearer token
        - in: header
          name: Prefer
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: Controls the response type from the insert
          default: return=minimal
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              oneOf:
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/item'
                - $ref: '#/components/schemas/itemCollection'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Status of the create request.
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '409':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ConflictRequest'
        '5XX':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/exception'
            text/html:
              schema:
                type: string

components:
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  responses:
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/exception'
    BadRequest:
      description: The request was malformed or semantically invalid
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/exception'
    ConflictRequest:
      description: The request has a conflict
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/exception'
    InternalServerError:
      description: The request was syntactically and semantically valid, but an error occurred while trying to act upon it
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/exception'

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /items: post: operation "postFeature": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: oneOf: [0]: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/item": resolve reference "#/components/schemas/item": resolve "#/components/schemas/item": unexpected invalid
